.. py:module:: ethereum.shanghai.vm.precompiled_contracts.sha256

Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) SHA256 PRECOMPILED CONTRACT
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

Introduction
------------

Implementation of the `SHA256` precompiled contract.


.. only:: stage1

Module Details
---------------

sha256
~~~~~~


.. function:: sha256(evm: ethereum.shanghai.vm.Evm) -> None
   :noindexentry:

   Writes the sha256 hash to output.

   :param evm: The current EVM frame.
